code: import React,{Component}from'react';import{toKebabCase}from'../utilities/toKebabCase';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class AttributeSet extends Component{render(){const{setName,attributes,selectedAttributes,handleCheckboxChange}=this.props;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"attribute-set","data-testid":"cart-item-attribute-".concat(toKebabCase(setName)),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"attribute-set-name",children:setName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"attributes",children:attributes.map(attr=>{const isSelected=selectedAttributes[setName]===attr.id;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"attribute",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"inner-attribute ".concat(isSelected?'selected':''),style:setName==='Color'?{backgroundColor:attr.value}:{},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",onChange:()=>handleCheckboxChange(setName,attr.id),checked:isSelected,"data-testid":"cart-item-attribute-".concat(toKebabCase(setName),"-").concat(toKebabCase(attr.display_value)).concat(isSelected?'-selected':'')}),setName!=='Color'&&attr.display_value]})},attr.id);})})]},setName);}}export default AttributeSet;
